## PR Title Format (required)

**Format:** `JIRA-123 <type>(scope) <short description>`

Examples:
- JIRA-29: add login validation

---

## Jira Ticket
- Link: [JIRA-123](https://your-jira-instance/browse/PROJECT-123)

---

_Describe what this PR does and why._
